component.name: OpenShot Video Editor
component.summary: An easy to use, quick to learn, and surprisingly powerful video editor

description.p: OpenShot Video Editor is a free, open-source, non-linear video editor. It can create and edit videos and movies using many popular video, audio, image formats. Create videos for YouTube, Flickr, Vimeo, Metacafe, iPod, Xbox, and more!

Features include:
Multiple tracks (layers)
Compositing, image overlays, and watermarks
Audio mixing and editing
Support for image sequences (rotoscoping)
Key-frame animation
Video effects (chroma-key)
Transitions (lumas and masks)
Titles with integrated editor and templates
3D animation (titles and effects)
